Package org.cougaar.core.domain

This package contains the Cougaar DomainManager and LogicProvider interfaces.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ABAChangeLogicProvider A LogicProvider that handles community membership changes.
DelayedLPAction An action by a LogicProvider that is delayed until all the other LogicProviders have a chance to run.
Domain A domain provides problem-specific support for blackboard objects, such as an object Factory and LogicProviders to automate object behaviors and communicate with remote agents.
DomainRegistryService This service allows Domains to register with the agent's DomainManager.
EnvelopeLogicProvider A LogicProvider that handles blackboard transaction add/change/remove EnvelopeTuples.
Factory A factory allows clients to create domain-specific object instances.
LogicProvider A logic provider performs the blackboard and message handling work of a Domain.
LogicProviderNeedingPersistenceEnvelopes A LogicProvider that needs to see PersistenceEnvelopes.
MessageLogicProvider A LogicProvider that handles incoming Directive messages.
RestartLogicProvider A LogicProvider that handles agent restart reconciliation.
RootPlan The "root" plan provides blackboard access to Domain LogicProviders, including a view of all UniqueObjects on the blackboard.
SupportsDelayedLPActions A marker interface for Domains that handle DelayedLPActions.
XPlan An "xplan" is a marker interface for a domain-specific blackboard view that is shared between Domains through the XPlanService.
XPlanService This service provides Domain access to other domain XPlans.
 

Class Summary
DomainAdapter This component is an optional base class for Domain implementations.
DomainManager This component is a container for Domains.
RestartLogicProviderHelper Helper methods for RestartLogicProviders.
RootDomain This component is the minimal "root" domain that creates the basic RootPlan for other Domains and loads the RelayLP.
RootPlanImpl Standard implementation of RootPlan.
 

Exception Summary
FactoryException A runtime exception thrown by a Factory.
 

Package org.cougaar.core.domain Description

This package contains the Cougaar DomainManager and LogicProvider interfaces.

A Domain provides problem-specific support for blackboard objects, such as an object Factory and LogicProviders to automate object behaviors and communicate with remote agents. The Blackboard single-threadedly invokes the Domains at the end of every blackboard transaction and incoming message delivery.

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
